Uses of Interface
playn.core.Surface

  • Packages that use Surface 
    Package Description
    playn.core  
    playn.core.canvas  
    playn.core.gl  

    • Uses of Surface in playn.core

      Methods in playn.core that return Surface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Surface Surface.clear()
      Clears the entire surface to transparent blackness.
      Surface Surface.drawImage(Image image, float dx, float dy)
      Draws an image at the specified location.
      Surface Surface.drawImage(Image image, float dx, float dy, float dw, float dh)
      Draws a scaled or repeated image at the specified location.
      Surface Surface.drawImage(Image image, float dx, float dy, float dw, float dh, float sx, float sy, float sw, float sh)
      Draws a scaled subset of an image at the specified location.
      Surface Surface.drawImageCentered(Image image, float dx, float dy)
      Draws an image, centered at the specified location.
      Surface Surface.drawLayer(Layer layer)
      Renders the supplied scene graph into this surface.
      Surface Surface.drawLine(float x0, float y0, float x1, float y1, float width)
      Fills a line between the specified coordinates, of the specified (pixel) width.
      Surface Surface.fillRect(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Fills the specified rectangle.
      Surface Surface.fillTriangles(float[] xys, float[] sxys, int[] indices)
      Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill pattern.
      Surface Surface.fillTriangles(float[] xys, float[] sxys, int xysOffset, int xysLen, int[] indices, int indicesOffset, int indicesLen, int indexBase)
      Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill pattern.
      Surface Surface.fillTriangles(float[] xys, int[] indices)
      Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill color or pattern.
      Surface Surface.fillTriangles(float[] xys, int xysOffset, int xysLen, int[] indices, int indicesOffset, int indicesLen, int indexBase)
      Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill color or pattern.
      Surface Surface.restore()
      Restores the transform previously stored by save().
      Surface Surface.rotate(float radians)
      Rotates the current transformation matrix by the specified angle in radians.
      Surface Surface.save()
      Saves the current transform.
      Surface Surface.scale(float sx, float sy)
      Scales the current transformation matrix by the specified amount on each axis.
      Surface Surface.setAlpha(float alpha)
      Set the alpha component of this surface's current tint.
      Surface Surface.setFillColor(int color)
      Sets the color to be used for fill operations.
      Surface Surface.setFillPattern(Pattern pattern)
      Sets the pattern to be used for fill operations.
      Surface Surface.setShader(GLShader shader)
      Configures a custom shader to use when drawing images and shapes to this surface.
      Surface Surface.setTint(int tint)
      Sets the tint for this layer, as ARGB.
      Surface Surface.setTransform(float m11, float m12, float m21, float m22, float dx, float dy)
      Deprecated. 
      You almost certainly do not want to do this because this will wipe out any pre-configured HiDPI transform and break automatic handling of HiDPI screens. You should instead use transform(float, float, float, float, float, float), and possibly save() and restore() if you need to return to the "identity" (which is in quotes because the identity on a HiDPI screen will not be the the actual identity matrix).
      Surface SurfaceImage.surface()
      Returns an interface that can be used to draw into this image.
      Surface Surface.transform(float m11, float m12, float m21, float m22, float dx, float dy)
      Multiplies the current transformation matrix by the given matrix.
      Surface Surface.translate(float x, float y)
      Translates the current transformation matrix by the given amount.
      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type Surface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImmediateLayer.Renderer.render(Surface surface)
      Renders the contents of this layer using the supplied Surface.

    • Uses of Surface in playn.core.canvas

      Classes in playn.core.canvas that implement Surface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CanvasSurface
      Implementation class, to be used by platforms that implement Surface as just a special case of Canvas.
